item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 1.0.0

What's New

  • Initial Release: Launch of SupaSidebar with Arc-inspired design
  • Global Shortcuts: Quick access with ⌘⇧Space and command panel with ⌘⌃K
  • Browser Integration: Save pages and copy URLs from any browser
  • Multi-Screen Support: Floating sidebar that works across displays
  • CloudKit Sync: Your links sync across devices
  • Auto-Updates: Sparkle integration for seamless updates
